title: Land for sale near Athurugiriya Highway inter-exchange
details:
This land is situated in Boralugoda Isuru uyana
1 km to Pore fuel Station (Athurugiya Malabe main Rd).
1 km to Ruckmalgama Junction (Athurugiriya Pitakotuwa 138' bus Rd)
6 km to Kottawa Town
900 m to Athurugiriya Town by shortcut.
Very highly reputed & calm down environment

Clear deeds & approved plans
